The lounges and the bedrooms are fully furnished with the antique original furniture and all around there are the books and the objects of daily use from the past. The cosy self catered apartments are in the park, and overlook the sea too. The lush landscaped gardens face the sea and are full of enchanting spots, the panoramic swimming pool lies between the olives and the vineyards and faces the sea too. B&B and self catered accommodations, breakfast, lunch and dinner (May-Sep), bicycles, parking, aircon, wifi.

, The Hotel Gala is situated in Pesaro sea front, in a quite area, only 30 meters from the beach. It is ideal for summer holidays and a point of reference to discover the culture, tastes and traditions of the Marches. Extremely quiet and wonderfully furnished, the spacious bedrooms offer tranquility to enjoy your holiday in the almost comfort. All the rooms are equipped with en suite bathroom and shower, sea view balcony, air conditioning, fridge, safe, satellite tv and telephone
